Package model

Class Hand

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Hand
  • public class Hand
extends java.lang.Object
    The Hand class gets the cards from the deck and works as the main component for the game, showing the user their cards.
    Version:
    1.0 7.5.2021
    Author:
    Ville Riepponen

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Deck currentDeck
      Deck object to get the cards for the hand
      private Card[] hand
      Array with the size of a hand to hold the current hand
      (package private) static int HANDSIZE
      The final handsize which is always 5
      private Card[] sortedHand
      Array to include the sorted hand for internal methods
